text: What do I see in this picture? This reminds me probably of when I was very young. Okay, mom is washing the dishes. I don't know why. She's not looking at the kids who are getting into the cookie jar, and the young boy is about, of course, to topple over because the stool's tipping. But why the water is overflowing in the sink, I have no idea. She seems so serene and yet so out of it. Okay. Not paying attention really to what's going on. And that's what I see in that
